Description -

Sarah Carter leads a pretty normal life as a Profiler, but that is all about to change! After witnessing a strange ritual, Sarah is now able to see the last few minutes of a murdered personâ€™s life! Use this special talent to get to the bottom of a morbid circle and reveal a huge conspiracy! Go on an incredible journey in Reading the Dead, a fantastic Hidden Object game!

* Incredible action
* Gorgeous graphics
* Stop a murderer!

System Requirements:

* OS: Windows XP/Vista/7
* CPU: 1.0 GHz
* RAM: 256 MB
* DirectX: 8.1
* Hard Drive: 379 MB

I installed the game but a message appears:This application has failed to start because the application configuration is incorrect.Reinstalling the application may fix this problem.So I did it but the problem is the same.Can someone to help me?
same as me british. first time from a wendy99 game
If anyone has the same problem, go into the files where the game is install (program files/games in my case.) and install everything you see in the resources files.
